newsitem.title: NORWAY: Norway C. Bank sets 3.7 pct July 7-14 deposit rate.
newsitem.headline: Norway C. Bank sets 3.7 pct July 7-14 deposit rate.

text.p: Norway's central bank, Norges Bank, said on Friday it had set its fixed-term deposit rate for the period July 7 to 14 at 3.7 percent.
It is the fourth time this week the bank has announced a fixed interest rate.
On Tuesday it announced a rate of 3.6 percent for its fixed-term deposit rate between July 1 and July 3 and a rate of 3.7 percent for the period July 2 to July 7.
On Wednesday it set a fixed-term deposit rate of 3.7 percent for the period July 3 to July 7.
Norges Bank regularly announces fixed-term deposits or fixed-term loans, which are usually carried out through ordinary auctions, in order to control money market liquidity.
